text: فَلَمَّا عَتَوۡاْ عَن مَّا نُهُواْ عَنۡهُ قُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

translation.en: So when they were insolent about that which they had been forbidden, We said to them, "Be apes, despised
translation.id: Maka setelah mereka bersikap sombong terhadap segala apa yang dilarang. Kami katakan kepada mereka, "Jadilah kamu kera yang hina
